channel.title: [508] - help needed with client ip
channel.description: ok i've gone into client.java and changed the ip to 127.0.0.1 but when i load the client it says: error js5connect basically its offline and i dont know why... my runserver seems to be working fine it says: [code]starting server on port:5555 error loading banned users list[/code] i dont think its because of the banned user list because it says the servers starting but i dont know im using aznzsscape base can anyone help? thanks

item.title: [508] - help needed with client ip
item.dc:creator: @servernerd servernerd
item.description:
@servernerd wrote:

ok i’ve gone into client.java and changed the ip to 127.0.0.1 but when i load the client it says: error js5connect
basically its offline and i dont know why…
my runserver seems to be working fine it says:

starting server on port:5555 error loading banned users list
i dont think its because of the banned user list because it says the servers starting but i dont know im using aznzsscape base can anyone help? thanks
